name: ashwadi
title: Aswathi Sastram
author: Sri. Sabapathi Mudaliyar
description: A rare book on Aswa sasthram( Ayurveda Veterinary Science on Horses) Ayurveda details medical science on Elephants and Horses- precisely known as Mrigayurveda

name: padinenSiddargalinNadiSastram
title: Pathinen Siddharkal Nadi Sasthiram
author: Kalathur Kandasamy Mudaliyar
description: The book contains Tamil poems and paragraphs detailing all about Nadi Pareeksha and prognosis of different acute health conditions and also about omens

name: yogaRatnakaram
title: Yoga Rathnakaram
author: V. B. Nataraja Sastrigal
description: The book details elaborately about diseases starting from Jwara and variety of medications and formularies in a unique way

name: visachikitsa
title: Visa Chikitsa Pravesika
author: Keralavarma Cheriyamaman Thamburan
description: The book details toxic effects of different types of insects, animals and snakes. The author explains management protocol for every toxic bites

name: aasavaaristam
title: Asavarishta Kalpam
author: Vaidya Bhupathy Sri. Krishna rao
description: This is a book detailing variety of Asavas, Arishtas and santhana kriyas. Written in Tamil, the author hand picked and compiled Arishtasava formulations from the classics of Ayurveda viz Bhaishaja Rathnavali, Gadanigraha and Charaka Samhitha. A great work by the Author

name: yogaSutram
title: Pathanchala yoga suthram
author: Kadalangudi Natesa Sastri
description: The book details Yoga Darsanam and outlines Nyayam, Sankhyam, Vaiseshikam and Meemamsa. A unique work on Pathanjala yoga sutra in Sanskrit verses and Tamil narrative

name: ratnakaram
title: Nigandu Ratnakaram
author: Vaidya Bhupathy S.Krishnarao
description: The book is a dictionary of herbal drugs. A compendium of synonyms of each herbal drug.

name: moovar
title: Moovar
author: Narayana Iyengar
description: The book is a compilation of the author who wrote the content as a weekly article in a health magazine then published. Its a rare book about Bruhath thrayees and about many unknown facts about our great Acharyas, their work and period with historical evidence. He also describes about 7 important Acharyas and mentions about 27 siddhars. A great work

name: siddayogam
title: Sahasra Siddha Yogam
author: Vaidya Bhupathy S.Krishnarao
description: The book has 2 volumes. The Author details different formulations of Kasayam, Curnam and others for every single ailments. A very useful book for medical practioners

name: kaviraja
title: Kaviraja Sekaram
author: Vaidya Bhupathy S.Krishnarao
description: The book has 3 volumes and details about Ayurveda medicine formulations and applications. The author compiled various yogas from a number of Ayurveda classics including Ashtanga Hrudayam to publish the compendium

name: tridoshalok
title: Tridosha Lok
author: Viswanath Dwiwedi
description: The book details about three doshas ( Vata, Pitta and Kapha ), their normal and abnormal status

name: suthika
title: Sudhikramalankaram
author: Ayurveda Visarada K.Srinivasarao
description: The book narrates purification of raw drugs before subjecting them to formulations

name: paribasha
title: Paribashai Vilakkam
author: K. Srinivasarao
description: The book is a compendium of different raw drugs classified and grouped in duo, three, four and upto ten by their properties and Therapeutic actions. A great work by the author

name: balaChikitsa
title: Bala Chikitasa
author: Godhavarman Tirumulpad
description: The book narrates about Peadiatric ailments and simple herbal remedies

name: sadaranaBhasma
title: Sadharana Bhasmas
author: Dr. P. S. Ramanathan
description: A hand written note by the author on different varieties of Bhasma preparations and their Therapeutic indications. He has also mentioned a number of drugs and their properties. This note was written before 1950 using Sanskrit, Malayalam and Tamil

name: amaraKosam
title: Amarakosam
author: Kaikulankara Rama Varier
description: The Ancient Sanskrit Thesaurus with Balabodhini Bhasha commentary in malayalam is a rare work

name: astangaHrudayamUtt
title: Ashtanga Hrudayam Uthara sthanam
author: Vagbhatacharya
description: The book is unique with " Kairali Vyakhyana " Commentary which details and elaborates the meaning of  sloka in Sanskrit and foot notes in Malayalam

name: dharaKalpa
title: Dhara Kalpa
author: Vaidya Jegannath Prasad
description: The small book summarises the formulations prepared and used in Dhara

name: angadiMarunthukal
title: Angadi Marunthukal
author: K.Govinda Menon
description: The book narrates simple herbal drugs for every ailments. A very useful work by the author

name: kWATHAYOGANI124830
title: Kwatha yogani
author: Vaidyarathnam Oushadhasala
description: A compendium of 123 kasaya formulations which are widely used in clinical practice

name: keraleeyaPanchakarmaChikitsaVijnanam
title: Keraleeya Panchakarma Chikitsa Vijnanam
author: Dr. T. L. Devaraj
description: The book details the Panchakarma therapy procedures practiced in Kerala

name: sarngadharaSamhitha(Sanskrit)
title: Sarngadhara samhitha
author: Vaidya Parasurama Sastri, Vidyasagar
description: The Ayurveda classic has 3 parts (Khanda ) and the author narrates well with Deepika vyakhyana ( commentary)

name: bhaisajyaKalpamTamilByJaganathanNaidu1906
File_Name: Bhaisajya kalpam Tamil by Jaganathan Naidu 1906.pdf
title: Bhaishajya kalpam
author: M. Jagannatha Naidu, Mysore Palace surgeon
description: The book is a compendium of herbal and mineral sources, their properties and formularies prepared by using an exclusive combination of the mentioned drugs. A Very useful book for the students, learners and practitioners

name: sarvakatiSankaramennumVishaVaidiyaThirattu
title: Visha vaidya Tirattu
author: Chenji Ekambara Mudaliyar
description: The book explains different kinds of animal toxins and toxic bites and herbal anti toxins

name: maattumVagadam
title: Mattu Vakadam
author: K. B. Thiyagarajan
description: The book is a rare publication in Tamil details about Veterinary Tamil medicine. The Author explains different ailments affecting cattle and the simple effective herbal medicines in their management

name: sareeraMarmaVijyanamByVd.RadhaKrishnaShastri
File_Name: Sareera Marma Vijyanam by Vd. Radha Krishna Shastri.pdf
title: Sareera Marma Vignanam
author: Vaidya visarada S. V. Radhakrishna Sastrigal
description: A great work by the Author on Marmas and their clinical importance in both medical and surgical perspective. Written in Tamil with sanskrit slokas

name: rajaMrigankaTamilAndSanskrit
title: Rajamriganka
author: Ayurveda Acharya V. B. Nataraja Sastri
description: The book has many informations about Mercurial and other Ayurveda medicines

name: sarvarogaChikitsaRathnam
title: Sarvaroga Chikitsa rathnam
author: Cheriya Kelan Vaidyan
description: The author has compiled the Pathogenesis and Management of innumerable diseases with classical references. He has also narrated a variety of Ayurveda formularies in the final chapters. A very useful book on Ayurveda published during early 90s

name: madhavaNidanamTamil
title: Madhava Nidana
author: Vaidyarathnam Pandit M. Duraiswamy Aiyangar
description: With Nidana Deepika Commentary. A great work in Tamil by the Author

name: sarngadharaSamhithaTamil
title: Sarngadhara samhitha
author: Vaidyarathnam Pandit M. Duraiswami Aiyangar
description: With Tamil commentary known as Sarngadhara Deepika. A great work by the author

name: vaidyasastraSathasloki
title: Vaidyasastra sathasloki
author: Dr. P. S. Ramanathan
description: The notes narrate treatment protocols on the basis of Ayurveda chikitsa sutra. A number of Clinical conditions are narrated by the Author. It is written using Sanskrit, Tamil and Malayalam languages

name: charakaSamhithaSidhiSthana
title: Charaka Samhitha Sidhi sthana
author: T. C.Parameswaran Moosad & C. K. Vasudeva sarma
description: A very rare book of Charaka samhitha sidhi sthana with vachaspathyam narratinve commentary

name: tarkasangraha
title: Tarkasangraha
author: Vaidya Vachaspathy Pandit P. S. Ramasarma
description: The book is a detailed work by the author on Tarka Sangraha with unique commentary known as ' Sakthi Sanjivini'. His Scholarly commentary in sanskrit elaborate Padarthas and Tatwas

name: sahaarayogam(mal)
title: Sahasrayogam
author: Tamarakulam G.Kochu Sankaran Vaidyar
description: A compendium of Ayurveda classical formularies with malayalam commentary

name: abhidhanaManjari
title: Abidana manjari
author: Bhishagarya Narayana sarma and Sankara Sarma
description: The book is a detailed analytical work on Sodhanadi Ganas such as Madananadi

name: bharathiyaOushadhaChedikal
title: Bharathiya Oushadha Chedikal
author: K.Govinda Menon
description: The book is a compendium of 734 medicinal herbs with the details of nomenclature, morphology,habitat and properties

name: aMARAKOSAM(mal)
title: Amarakosam
author: Kaikulankara Rama Varier
description: The Ancient Sanskrit Thesaurus with Balabodhini Bhasha commentary in malayalam is a rare work
